title: support
body:
Guys I cant access my Support tickets because it says that im on a different server which im not...
I cant find any tickets from the past or current.
Please help

replies.body:
I've noticed a lot of players having issues with accessing the support site and tickets, but you should still be able to talk back and forth with the agents and access those tickets through the email notifications you get as well.

With that in mind, go ahead and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or trying a private browsing windows to see if that lets you get into the ticket area!
Thanks! Ive managed to access it through my Email :)
